page.shortlink: api objects control object container get function
page.description: Returns the name of the control's container.
page.discussion: The .CONTAINER_GET() method returns the name of the control's container. The method returns NULL ("") unless the control is placed within a container within the form. The method is useful when using tabbed controls and frames.
page.example: dim ptr as P dim fld as P ptr = form.load("customerx") fld = ptr.child("Fullname") ? fld.Container_Get() -> "TABBED1.tabs.sheet[2]"
